title: Murder in Slow Motion:  Episode 86
itunes:subtitle: At 19, Hollie Gazzard from Gloucester had everything to live for - bright, fun, pretty with lots of friends and a loving family.  But then she met Asher Maslin, who started out as a boyfriend and until his increasingly controlling behaviour made him so...
content:encoded:
At 19, Hollie Gazzard from Gloucester had everything to live for - bright, fun, pretty with lots of friends and a loving family.  But then she met Asher Maslin, who started out as a boyfriend and until his increasingly controlling behaviour made him someone Hollie didn't want as part of his life.  But Asher wouldn't let go.

https://holliegazzard.org/
itunes:author: UK True Crime Podcast
dc:creator: UK True Crime Podcast
